content:
How does Harvard monitor the 1TB per researcher limit? There is nothing inherent in the code, right?

From this page: https://support.dataverse.harvard.edu/researchers

Says "up to 1TB", is it per researcher, per dataset, per collection?? Or not specified.
From what I gather it's a bit the honor system.
I haven't been following #9409 closely but @Leo Andreev has been making progress toward some sort of system for storage quotas.
